      class  CoreferenceSemanticItemFactory
      Class to create semantic objects specific to coreference, such as expressions and coreference chains.

      Methods in gov.nih.nlm.ling.io with parameters of type SemanticItemFactory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Document XMLReader.load(java.lang.String fileName, SpanList spansToProcess, java.lang.String tokenizerName, java.lang.String parserName, SemanticItemFactory sif, java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<? extends SemanticItem>,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> annotationTypes, java.util.Set<java.lang.String> ignoreArgTypes)
      Similar to #load(String, boolean, String, String, Map, List), but also the spans to process for semantics (i.e., zones) can be specified.

      Loads the content from an XML file.
      Document XMLReader.load(java.lang.String fileName, java.lang.String tokenizerName, java.lang.String parserName, boolean parseSemantics, java.lang.Class<? extends SemanticItemFactory> sifClass, java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<? extends SemanticItem>,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> annotationTypes, java.util.Set<java.lang.String> ignoreArgTypes)
      Similar to #load(String, boolean, Class, Map, Set), but the tokenizer/parser output to use for further processing can be selected.

      Similar to #load(String, String, String, boolean, Class, String, Map, Set), but also the spans to process for semantics (i.e., zones) can be specified.
